title: Apple Reports Record-Setting 1Q 2026 Results: $42.1B Profit on $143.8B Revenue
full_text: Apple Reports Record-Setting 1Q 2026 Results: $42.1B Profit on $143.8B Revenue. Apple today announced financial results for the first fiscal quarter of 2026, which corresponds to the fourth calendar quarter of 2025. For the quarter, Apple posted revenue of $143.8 billion and net quarterly profit of $42.1 billion, or $2.84 per dilute….
